section.title: Xlib Compose Keys for cs_CZ.UTF-8
section.para: Applications using Xlib input handling should recognize these compose key sequences in locales using the cs_CZ.UTF-8 compose table.

This compose table includes the non-conflicting entries from: /data/data/com.lfgit/files/usr/share/X11/locale/en_US.UTF-8/Compose. Those entries are not shown here - see those charts for the included key sequences.
UTF-8 (Unicode) compose sequences Modified for Czech, following iso8859-2/Compose by James Cloos <cloos@jhcloos.com> based on bug report by Vladimír Marek <vlmarek@volny.cz>

row.entry: Use the sequences from en_US.UTF-8 as the basis:
"ů" U016F # LATIN SMALL LETTER U WITH RING ABOVE
"Ů" U016E # LATIN CAPITAL LETTER U WITH RING ABOVE
